short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reelevant's extension is used to debug marketing contents inside emails or marketing channels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension allows to debug personalized content produced by Reelevant's platform directly within Chrome.
Features:
- Quick access to definition of the workflow
- Quick access to the content used to generate the content
- Quick access to a debug interface to understand the behavior of the workflow
